opis: Prodaje se prostrana kuća u Samoboru (KLADJE), od 432,46 m2, Šoićeva ulica, 2,4 km udaljena od centra Samobora i trgovačkog centra, 10 minuta hoda do osnovne škole Okućnica 1946 m2. Mogućnost parkiranja do 20 automobila. Smještena je na prostranoj parceli okružena zelenilom i voćnjakom sa pretežno starinskim sortama. Kuća se sastoji od: PRIZEMLJE – profesionalna kuhinja (za catering, profesionalno pečenje kolača ili za bilo šta drugo.) Do toga postoji prostorija za komore ili za spremanje namirnica, također postoji hladan podrum za namirnice. U prizemlju se još nalazi apartman koji treba uredit, te ulazna vrata i predviđena recepcija. 1. KAT – može se doći s donje strane i lijeve i desne po stepenicama, te postoji gornji ulaz. Ulaz u prostrani hodnik s wc-om ,  dnevna soba 60 m2, te kuhinja i blagavaonica. Izlaz iz dnevne sobe na dvije velike terase. U prizemlju se  nalazi  još jedan wc. Također i na tom dijelu s vanjske strane postoji apartman sa svim pripremam, samo ga treba završit. POTKROVLJE-  u potkrovlje dolazi  se prekrasnim stepenicama, i također postoje vrata za izlaz na gornju terasu. Potkrovlje se sastoji od četiri prostrane spavaće sobe, dvije sobe imaju zasebni tuš i wc unutar soba, a druge dvije sobe imaju zajedničku kupaonicu. Kuća je predviđena za veliku obitelj ili se može prenamijeniti za bilo šta: starački dom, najam soba, catering, restoran sa sobama… Za sve dodatne informacije molim da mi se obratite na: Vlasta Boranić Licencirani agent za posredovanje nekretninama +385 91 157 1972 v.boranic@remax.hr RE/MAX City 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor Sve informacije dane od agenta smatraju se važećim, no moraju se zasebno procijeniti. A spacious house for sale in Samobor (KLADJE), 432.46 m2, Šoićeva street, 2.4 km from the center of Samobor and the shopping center, 10 minutes' walk to the elementary school Yard 1946 m2. Possibility of parking up to 20 cars. It is located on a spacious plot surrounded by greenery and an orchard with mostly old varieties. The house consists of: GROUND FLOOR – professional kitchen (for catering, professional baking of cakes or for anything else.) In addition, there is a room for chambers or for storing food, there is also a cold cellar for food. On the ground floor, there is still an apartment that needs to be decorated, as well as an entrance door and a planned reception. 1ST FLOOR - it can be reached from the lower side both left and right by stairs, and there is an upper entrance. Entrance to a spacious hallway with toilet, living room 60 m2, and kitchen and dining room. Exit from the living room to two large terraces. There is another toilet on the ground floor. There is also an apartment on the outside of that part with all the preparations, it just needs to be finished. ATTIC - the attic is reached by a beautiful staircase, and there is also a door to the upper terrace. The attic consists of four spacious bedrooms, two rooms have a separate shower and toilet inside the rooms, and the other two rooms have a shared bathroom. The house is designed for a large family or can be converted for anything: nursing home, room rental, catering, restaurant with rooms... For any additional information, please contact me at: Vlasta Boranić Licensed real estate agent +385 91 157 1972 v.boranic@remax.hr RE/MAX City 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor All information provided by the agent is considered valid, but must be evaluated separately.
